title: CHARMING CHARLIE ANNOUNCES PLUS SIZE COLLECTION
text:
Houston, Texas, May 18, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Charming Charlie, the women’s contemporary fashion and accessories retailer known for its shop by color concept, today announced the launch of its new plus size collection, CC Curve. Available in sizes 1X-3X for women sizes 16-24, CC Curve provides on trend apparel all priced under $45. Beginning May 16, the collection will be available for purchase at all Charming Charlie stores, with its top stores expected to receive up to 40 new styles a month.
CC Curve features Charming Charlie’s fun and feminine aesthetic that its customers know and love in an assortment of tops and dresses. Staying true to the brand’s core apparel, the new collection emulates its colorful prints and seasonal design details with curated size extensions as well as exclusive styles infused with the brand’s charming details.
"We are happy to be able to better serve our customers by providing an inclusive shopping experience that celebrates women,” said Lana Krauter, Chief Executive Officer of Charming Charlie. "We are excited to offer a collection of on trend fashion in extended sizes at affordable prices."
About Charming Charlie:
Charming Charlie is a one-of-a-kind source of style that's been inspiring women to live more colorfully since 2004. Known for offering a wide array of women’s apparel and fashion accessories, beauty, gifts and more, all ingeniously arranged by color; making that perfect look fun and easy to find. With over 260 stores in the United States, Charming Charlie continues to spread color and style from coast to coast with irresistibly affordable fashion that keep women coming back again and again. For more information, please visit www.charmingcharlie.com or follow us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and YouTube.
